body.p: To his Exellency Beriah Magoffin Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Your Petitioners Some time ago signed a Remonstrance against a Petition for the Pardon of Charles H. Tomlinson from the prison for killing Thomas Ests wherefore we Joine in a Petition with the orignal Petitioenrs praying for his release and pardon having been convinced that we were mislead. -- We all live in the Neighbourhood where the fatal occurance happened. --

The reason that I signed the remonstrance they told me my name was forged to the petition. I have since found the assertion to be false J James

George Newton
Wm Dougherty

We the undersigned petitioners would not sign said remonstrance and believing the killing Thomas Estes by C H Tomlinson to be a case of self defence, and also believing the report to be false that said Tomlinson intended killing all the Estes as was extensively reported to be false we therefore pray your excellency to pardon and release him
